recipe.title: Hasselback Pizza Chicken Recipe by Tasty

steps.step: Cut seven slits on the top of the chicken breast.
In each slit, spread 1 teaspoon of tomato puree, 1 mozzarella slice, and 1 salami slice.
Sprinkle on the cheddar cheese and oregano.
Bake for 20 minutes or until chicken is cooked through. It should have an internal temperature of 165˚F (75˚C).

steps_updated.steps_updated: Cut seven slits on the top of the chicken breast.

Sprinkle on the cheddar cheese and oregano.
Bake for 20 minutes or until chicken is cooked through.
It should have an internal temperature of 165˚F (75˚C).
